Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: PyWASM Terminal - Python in Browser

- Futuristic cyberpunk-themed Python interpreter
- WebAssembly powered by Pyodide
- Animated particle background with neon effects
- Glitch animations and scanline effects
- Line numbers and syntax support
- Mobile responsive design
- Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Enter, Tab, Ctrl+/)
- Creator branding and social links

Created by Yuval Avidani
AI Builder & Speaker | Founder of YUV.AI
GitHub Star | AWS Gen AI Superstar
EOF
)")
